TopicTitle: Ditto Twin Rovers, from BluPlanet Inc.

Articles.Content:
Hello all! Our faithful engineer lordhullo has released another rover! The Ditto is a pair of small, simple rovers (and cute as well) that can split into separate ones. It's fun to play around with, and if modified can be placed on top of a rocket and taken to another celestial body.

Download it here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/yep2guqw55pm71p/Ditto.craft

Before:

After:

Enjoy!

EDIT: Replaced decouplers with docking ports so you can now rejoin the two rovers!

Edited June 10, 2013 by Kerbol Prime
You could use a stage separator (blue) instead of two decouplers (yellow/red). Better yet, use docking ports. Nifty little design, though. I may experiment with something similar later.
